system.description:
Choose Plasarms, Lasarms, or Elarms.

Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.CbH9UMxgrmEr8tFh]{Personal Plasmas Proficiency}

Benefits

When using the chosen weapon type, the heat cost for attacks is multiplied by .75 rounded down (Minimum 1) and the Combat Point cost to reload is reduced by 1

Special

A character may take this feat multiple times. Each time the character takes the feat, they select a different type.
system.summary: .75 Heat cost and -1 CP cost to reload for chosen weapon
